headline: Parker-Hannifin’s Aerospace Strength And Integration Progress Test Lofty Valuation
summary: Parker-Hannifin (NYSE:PH) reported another quarter of strong aerospace growth and operational outperformance. The company highlighted faster than expected integration progress at acquired businesses, including Meggitt. Management announced early attainment of ambitious margin targets across key segments. Parker-Hannifin released a detailed sustainability report focused on cleaner technologies and social responsibility. The update included first-time organic growth in Europe after an extended...
